translation.title: Eight on Remaining and Emergence, Etc.

next.name: Seven on Emergence and Gladdening, Etc.

segments.en: 20–27. Eight on Remaining and Emergence, Etc.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ ṭhitikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusalo.
segments.en: One meditator is skilled in remaining in immersion but not in emerging from it. …”

segments.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ ṭhitikusalo.
Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṃ ṭhitikusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusalo.
Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ ṭhitikusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusalo ca.
(Purimamūlakāni viya yāva sattavīsatimā ṭhitimūlakasappāyakārīsuttā aṭṭha suttāni pūretabbāni. Ṭhitimūlakaṃ.)
segments.en: (These eight discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
